rows.label: tlk70000064_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Monster-bashing really needs mighty
hand of Driver, thinks Punpun. Not
a job for sleepy little Nopon.

rows.label: tlk70000064_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But in exchange of monster-bashing,
Punpun will teach friends clever
technique for future monster-bashes.

rows.label: tlk70000064_01_msg0003
rows.name:
When enemy is knocked to floor
in battle, this good time to use
technique to launch enemy.

rows.label: tlk70000064_01_msg0005
rows.name:
This very exhilarating
technique. Friends should
try it. Sets fur on end!

rows.label: tlk70000064_01_msg0006
rows.name:
How does pacifist Punpun know?
Punpun read about it in book.
